profile_summary:
As an Intermediate Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring expertise in **Ruby on Rails**, **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** practices, ensuring robust and scalable application development. My technical skills also encompass **PostgreSQL**, **Typescript**, **JavaScript**, **GitHub Actions**, **GitLab CI**, and tools for observability such as **Datadog** and **Sentry**. I have a proven track record in automating workflows and processes, leveraging **CircleCI**, **ECS**, **Redis**, **Elasticsearch**, **Ansible**, and **Pulumi** for effective DevOps practices.
I specialize in building high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors, with a strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems. I boast substantial cloud experience across **AWS** and **Azure**, having developed enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for real-time data processing and predictive analytics, while complying with standards such as HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My commitment to collaboration and effective communication drives my success in cross-functional teams.
